passages.name: Let's Start
passages.text:
Hello, welcome. Let's start this.

You have 2 options
[[Goto Option1->Option 1]] 
[[Option 2]] 
|Option 1>[This could be a description of Option 1]

hooks.hookText: This could be a description of Option 1
hooks.original: |Option 1>[This could be a description of Option 1]

passages.cleanText:
Hello, welcome. Let's start this.

You have 2 options

passages.name: Option 1
passages.text:
Your first option is to...

[[Back->Let's Start]]

passages.name: Option 2
passages.text:
Your second option is to...

[[Let's Start]]

passages.name: Wicked Witch of the West
passages.text: The Wicked Witch of the West is a nasty piece of work. She'll appear out of nowhere and it will cost you if you do something wrong. The problem is, nobody has been able to find out what that is exactly. Better to avoid her and go somewhere else if she turns up. Or perhaps you're lucky and find out what the one thing is that will kill her. Perhaps not...
passages.cleanText: The Wicked Witch of the West is a nasty piece of work. She'll appear out of nowhere and it will cost you if you do something wrong. The problem is, nobody has been able to find out what that is exactly. Better to avoid her and go somewhere else if she turns up. Or perhaps you're lucky and find out what the one thing is that will kill her. Perhaps not...

passages.name: Bottle
passages.text: This bottle looks like an ordinary wine bottle. It has a cap but appears to be empty.
